sys_openapi_operation.name: Get a Remote Link by ID
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Get a Remote Link by ID","fOperationId":"getRemoteLinkById","fDescription":"Retrieve the currently stored Remote Link data for the given ID.

The result will be what is currently stored, ignoring any pending updates or deletes.

Only Connect apps that define the `jiraRemoteLinkInfoProvider` module, and on-premise integrations, can access this resource.
This resource requires the 'WRITE' scope for Connect apps.
","fPath":"/remotelinks/1.0/remotelink/{remoteLinkId}","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"The Remote Link data currently stored for the given ID.
","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson8163481919","fTitle":"RemoteLinkData","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["displayName","id","lastUpdated","type","updateSequenceNumber","url"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"schemaVersion","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["1.0"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The schema version used for this data.

Placeholder to support potential schema changes in the future.
","fDefault":"1.0","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"choice"},{"fName":"id","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The identifier for the Remote Link. Must be unique for a given Provider.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"updateSequenceNumber","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"An ID used to apply an ordering to updates for this Remote Link in the case of out-of-order receipt of
update requests.

It must be a monotonically increasing number. For example, epoch time could be one way to generate the
`updateSequenceNumber`.

Updates for a Remote Link that is received with an `updateSqeuenceNumber` less than or equal to what is currently
stored will be ignored.
","fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"displayName","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The human-readable name for the Remote Link.

Will be shown in the UI.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"url","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The URL to this Remote Link in your system.
","fFormat":"uri","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"type","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["document","alert","test","security","logFile","prototype","coverage","bugReport","other"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The type of the Remote Link. The current supported types are 'document', 'alert', 'test',
'security', 'logFile', 'prototype', 'coverage', 'bugReport' and 'other'
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"choice"},{"fName":"description","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"An optional description to attach to this Remote Link.

This may be anything that makes sense in your system.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"lastUpdated","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The last-updated timestamp to present to the user as a summary of when Remote Link was last updated.
","fFormat":"date-time","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"glide_date_time"},{"fName":"associations","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxItems":2,"fMinItems":1,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"responseapplicationjson8163481919","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The entities to associate the Remote Link information with.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"status","fTitle":"RemoteLinkStatus","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["appearance","label"],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[{"fName":"appearance","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["default","inprogress","moved","new","removed","prototype","success"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Appearance is a fixed set of appearance types affecting the colour
of the status lozenge in the UI. The colours they correspond to are
equivalent to atlaskit's [Lozenge](https://atlaskit.atlassian.com/packages/core/lozenge) component.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"choice"},{"fName":"label","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The human-readable description for the Remote Link status.

Will be shown in the UI.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The status of a Remote Link.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"actionIds","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxItems":10,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"responseapplicationjson8163481919","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Optional list of actionIds. They are associated with the actions the provider is able to provide when they
registered. Indicates which actions this Remote Link has.

If any actions have a templateUrl that requires string substitution, then `attributeMap` must be passed in.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"attributeMap","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fAdditionalProperties":{"value":{"fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}},"fDescription":"Map of key/values (string to string mapping). This is used to build the urls for actions from the
templateUrl the provider registered their available actions with.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Data related to a single Remote Link.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Missing a JWT token, or token is invalid.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"The JWT token used does not correspond to an app that defines the `jiraRemoteLinkInfoProvider` module,
or the app does not define the 'READ' scope.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"No Remote Link data found for the given ID.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"429","fDescription":"API rate limit has been exceeded.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"503","fDescription":"Service is unavailable due to maintenance or other reasons.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"default","fDescription":"An unknown error has occurred.
","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson2171714298","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMinItems":1,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"responseapplicationjson2171714298","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["message"],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[{"fName":"message","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A human-readable message describing the error.","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"errorTraceId","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"An optional trace ID that can be used by Jira developers to locate the source of the error.","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A message supplied in the case of an error.","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Messages supplied in the case of an error.","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"remoteLinkId","fDescription":"The ID of the Remote Link to fetch.
","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"remoteLinkId5270970628","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fMaxLength":255,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Get a Remote Link by ID
